transcript:
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Mam aap ek baar puri baat toh sun lijiye meri aapne beech mein phone kaat diya. 
Customer: Mam Shivani ne meri baat bata di hai.
Executive: Bataye boliye boliye.
Executive: Aapka ticket close kar du mai aapke paas Shivani ka number hai aapke paas jaise hi feedback aata hai aap unhe bhej dijiyega.
Customer: Kar dijiye mam kar dijiye kar dijiye kar dijiye.
Executive: Theek hai aap Shivani ko screenshot bhej dijiyega jab bhi aata hai aapke paas beech mein kabhi bhi theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai mam.
Executive: Theek hai okay mam thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's call was disconnected in the middle of the conversation.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to close the ticket.

- Executive asked the customer to send a screenshot of the feedback to Shivani.



Next Steps: 

Issue resolved



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral to positive



@@@Key Topics:

ticket closure, feedback, screenshot
